attributes.action: Increase pay above 1% for NHS healthcare workers and recognise their work
attributes.additional_details:
The NHS workers have gone above and beyond their normal responsibilities to help, support and care for everyone during this pandemic.
Many have suffered both personally and professionally and I feel that “we” should recognise and reward their commitment and dedication to their duties. I feel that we should be thankful and grateful for people like Sir Captain Tom Moore - a shining example of a true gentleman.
attributes.background: Review the current proposed 1% pay rise for NHS workers in order to recognise their commitment, dedication and sacrifices during the COVID 19 pandemic.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Please give the NHS Covid Heroes a bigger pay rise.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577970

Recognise all members of NHS nursing profession by giving them a 12.5% pay rise
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560253
